Part 3:
1. 0x70d8 len 4: 6D 0D 45 9E
2. 0x7020 len 8: 5D 29 FE 43 A7 B4 26 06
3. Example 0: 00 00 00 00
Generalized, any integer which the last half (16 bits) are the reversed first half (16 bits).
4.
Dec   521829, Hex 0x0007f665, Binary 0b00000000000001111111011001100101
Dec -2207359, Hex 0xffde5181, Binary 0b11111111110111100101000110000001

We need to flip the endianness
Binary 0b00000000000001111111011001100101 => 0b10100110011011111110000000000000
Binary 0b11111111110111100101000110000001 => 0b10000001100010100111101111111111

In decimal final integers:
  252182 => 9792349696
-2207359 => 2173336575
